price: Ametukuka Mwenyezi Mungu, Mfalme wa Haki, hapana mungu ila Yeye, Mola Mlezi wa A'rshi Tukufu.
arabic: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ
footnotes: Utukufu ni wa Mwenyezi Mungu peke yake. Na Yeye ndiye Mwenye kumiliki ufalme wote. Hapana Mwenye kuabudiwa kwa Haki isipo kuwa Yeye. Na Yeye ndiye Mwenye A'rshi Tukufu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fataʿālā al-lahu al-maliku al-ḥaqu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-karīmi
